name: Shroomer Caves
description:
Description

In Shroomer Caves you play a Magical Mushroom follower. To increase mushroom power you dig into the caves and lead his branches to crystals. Water crystal will give you ability to call rain that will help you grow carrots. Purple crystal will let you upgrade your abilities. While in caves you use mushroom magic that is decreasing over time, to survive more bring make sure to bring more carrots!

To win lead mushroom branches to the Super Crystal.

Controls:

  • Running with WD or Arrows
  • Jump with W or UP Arrow
  • Fly with WASD or Arrows
  • Interact with objects with S or DOWN Arrow

Share your Scores!

If you complete the game make sure to share your score to compare to other players!
